casebody.data:
No. 2, original.

State of New Mexico v. State of Texas. May 2,’ 1927.

On consideration of the report of Charles Warren, Esq., the special master herein, respecting the services rendered by him as such special master;

It is ordered and decreed by the Court that the amount of the compensation of such special master for his servicés rendered herein be fixed at the sum of thirty-five hundred dollars, and that one-half of the same be paid by each of the parties hereto.
